title: On the run
creator_credit: Sparky Greene, Everard Films and Titan Films
brief_description: Filmed in New Zealand, features running trainer Arthur Lydiard and the world competition runners who use his program, as they comment about long-distance mountain running and its resulting increase in their stamina and the pleasures of roaming over the varied terrain.
creator_credit_for_label: Sparky Greene, Everard Films and Titan Films
